content: CONNECTION A JOIN-UP  A Function Cannot… Without. Connect. Function In life In song In sight In any sense The 1's The 0's The please don’t let goes… Cannot survive DISCONNECT Even when The time says ‘up’ DISCONNECT puts me down Connection is breath to me Connection is lesson Is pain Is lonely Is insane Is lost Is found Again And around the turn It shows back It outlasts Even when It fails It returns To start all over again It turns It longs It is in the rights Our wrongs Our hope Our faith In the wind In the trees Accident? Not here. Not with me. Connection is everything Connection is the only Truth -Cyborg
